name: The Binding Skull
description:
Controls: A-D move the character; Space attack; hold mouse1 to control the skull.

Very small game of a traveler, lost in a destroyed world, who finds a magical skull that binds him and guides him through the world. The game was made in 24 hours all the music and programming were done during the jam, the art was made by Kenney (1-Bit Pack).
